scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.dev: npm run dev --prefix server & npm start --prefix client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server && npm start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server && npm run cluster --prefix server
scripts.stop-cluster: pm2 stop server && pm2 delete server
